title: Enclosed Stair case - means a stair case separated by fire resistant walls and door(s) from the rest of the building
clause_text: Enclosed Stair case - means a stair case separated by fire resistant walls and door(s) from the rest of the building.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
